item.title: When monster dies it gives slayer xp?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

[quote=“Inmate™, post:12, topic:128052”]public void stupid slayermonsters() { if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) { if (npcs[i].npcType == ###) { c.AddSkilXP(##,##); }

declare

private client c;

He’s putting it in the method for npc death in the npchandler … he doesn’t need to put npcs.isDead == true because he’s putting it under

else if (npcs.IsDead == true) {

Atleast I hope he’s putting it under that.

location: class NPCHandler

location: class NPCHandler

from a static context
client.addSkillXP(85,18);
^
